definition: to visit/to call on sb/to look around
to explore/to search out/to scout/to visit/to stretch forward
full moon/to hope/to expect/to visit/to gaze (into the distance)/to look towards/towards

sentences.english: They rode over to see us last week.
sentences.chinese: 上星期他們騎馬來探望我們。

sentences.english: During my stay in bed, some of them came to see me and helped me with my lessons.
sentences.chinese: 我住院期間，一些同學來探望我，並幫我補習功課。

sentences.english: Zhaoqing visit old tin work, say to want to buy back his'll, send him back to the tangshan.
sentences.chinese: 肇慶探望老錫工，說要買回他的賣身契，送他回唐山。

sentences.english: ShangMingYang father came to visit troops, both father and son a heart-to-heart talk.
sentences.chinese: 湯名揚的爸爸來到部隊探望兒子，父子二人促膝談心。

sentences.english: The Chinese Embassy has already sent a working group to visit them.
sentences.chinese: 中國駐日使領館已經派工作組探望了有關漁民。

sentences.english: He visited his widowed mother yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 他昨天去探望他守寡的母親。

sentences.english: The establishment of visitation right system is a big step forward in marriage and family legislation in our country.
sentences.chinese: 探望權制度的確立，是我國婚姻家庭立法上一大進步。

sentences.english: The trees, like the longings of the earth, stand on tiptoe to peep at the heaven.
sentences.chinese: 樹木就像要表達大地的願望似的，踮起腳來探望蒼穹。

sentences.english: The first frost always meant that Papa was coming to see us.
sentences.chinese: 第一次霜降總是意味着爺爺來探望我們。

sentences.english: The visiting time is almost up.
sentences.chinese: 探望病人的時間快到了。

sentences.english: She encouraged Henry to visit him in prison.
sentences.chinese: 於是，妮基鼓勵亨利去監獄裏探望父親。

sentences.english: XiaoFei smoke a empty visit queen dugu.
sentences.chinese: 蕭妃抽了個空探望獨孤皇后。

sentences.english: Ye Lang after visiting the building, meet in the street a poem to victims.
sentences.chinese: 葉朗探望完世棟後，在街上遇見詩婷。

sentences.english: We had been visiting her cousin Mike who had managed to break his leg in a skateboard accident.
sentences.chinese: 之前我們在探望她那玩滑板弄傷了腿的表哥邁克。

sentences.english: The boy passed away just a few days later.
sentences.chinese: 探望後沒幾天小男孩就去世了。

sentences.english: The Department of Corrections is allowing you a one-hour visit with your son.
sentences.chinese: 懲教部批准給了你一個小時探望你兒子。

definition: to visit/to pay a call to
to visit (a patient, prisoner etc)/to look inquiringly
to visit a sick person or patient
to call to pay one's respect/to call on
to pay a visit/to call on
to express sympathy, greetings, consolation etc
to go home to visit one's family
to visit a prisoner (usu. a relative or friend)
to pay one's respects/to give regards to
to hasten home for the funeral of a parent or grandparent
to tend/to take care of sb
to be critically ill/to be terminally ill
to attend to the needs of (an invalid, disabled person etc)/caregiver
